nodes.text: The GT-40 Plasma Core Assault Cannon was a model of personal blaster cannon available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The GT-40 Plasma Core Assault Cannon was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Outer Rim Explorer's Pack, which was released to the Cartel Market on July 22, 2015.
